explains: n. 精神健全，精神正常；明智，通情达理

sentences.en: His behaviour was so strange that I began to doubt his sanity.
sentences.cn: 他行为怪异，我有点怀疑他是否神智正常。

sentences.en: After a series of road accidents the police pleaded for sanity among drivers.
sentences.cn: 在发生一系列交通事故之后，警方提请驾驶人要谨慎驾车。

sentences.en: He and his wife finally had to move from their apartment just to preserve their sanity.
sentences.cn: 他和妻子最后不得不搬离其公寓，只是为了保持精神正常。
